A Five-Star Experience at Paiza Sky Residences, Marina Bay Sands

I recently had the privilege of dining at Paiza Sky Residences at Marina Bay Sands, and I was blown away by the impeccable service and attention to detail. Two standout staff made exceptionally memorable: Wayne and Anthony.

Wayne provided outstanding service during the afternoon tea session. His attentiveness, professionalism, and warm demeanor truly set the tone for the day. He ensured everything was perfect, particularly his thoughtful recommendations on the menu. Wayne’s ability to anticipate my needs and his genuine hospitality elevated the entire afternoon tea experience.

In the evening, Anthony took over and delivered equally remarkable service during the evening dinner. His friendly approach, coupled with his efficiency, made the experience seamless and enjoyable. Anthony was attentive to every detail, ensuring my champagne and wine was always filled.

Speaking of the spread, the evening spread was nothing short of exquisite! A fine selection of flavours and textures that showcased the premium ingredients used at Sky Residences.

With such an exceptional team (Audrey, Stella, so many others!) and incredible dining offerings, Paiza Sky Residences redefines hospitality in Singapore. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a truly luxurious experience at Marina Bay Sands.

This restaurant offers top-notch service, stunning views, and exceptional food quality! We had the pleasure of experiencing the dinner spread during our stay. The quality of the food and service definitely exceeded my expectations.

Additional guest above 13 years old is at $300++/ person. For children age 6 to 12, there are different pricing depending on the menu (breakfast, afternoon tea and evening beverages and canapé).

The outstanding dining experience truly makes the experience enjoyable.

We came for cocktails and enjoyed the live music. Great experience, stuff is beyond great, attention to small details and the lady singing was just amazing. We are so happy to spend our last evening in Singapore exactly here! Thank you!

Top grade services, best view and superb foods. We tried afternoon tea, dinner and morning buffet, even though it is complimentary for suite guests the quality of the foods are better than most of hotel I have visited which makes the price worthy for the suite
Food and service are amazing, great view. My partner and I enjoyed our stay.
